newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Frankford, N.J..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Frankford, N.J..

text.p: The Board of Education of the Township of Frankford
Book Entry Bonds, Bank Qualified, Non-callable
SEALED PROPOSALS will be received by the Board Secretary of the Board of Education at the Administrative Offices of the Board of Education, 2 Pines Road, Branchville, N.J. on
until 11:00 a.m. for the purchase of the above Bonds of the School District dated May 1, 1997 and due (without option of prior redemption) on May 1 as follows:

The Bonds will be issued in book-entry form only, in the form of one certificate for the aggregate principal amount of the Bonds maturing in each year. The Bonds are redeemable at the option of the Board in accordance with the terms set forth in the full Notice of Sale. The Board will furnish Bonds and the approving legal opinion of McManimon & Scotland, Newark, N.J.

The Bonds will bear interest a single rate of interest in a multiple of 1/8 or 1/20 of 1% per annum specified by the successful bidder payable semiannually on May 1 and November 1 in each year until maturity, commencing on November 1, 1997. The Bonds will be sold to the bidder specifying the lowest rate of interest in accordance with the terms set forth in the full Notice of Sale.

The full Notice of Sale, the Official Statement and bid forms are available by contacting Peter Pearson, the Board Secretary at Frankford Township Board of Education, 2 Pines Road, P.O. Box 430, Branchville, N.J. 07826, (201) 948-3727.
